text: I am a 17 year old student in korea and I am stressed overwhelmingly by academics and the SAT.

One of my friends lost his brother to suicide 20 years ago and has still not completely dealt with/"gotten over" (I hate using that term with reference to someone/something that has died) it. My depression has become significantly increased in theI think my depression has made me feel dependent on people, and frankly I’m tired of it.
I finally did it! I just passed my graduation exam, got my Driver license and dad told me I can drive his car if I need to! I am happy!
I'm depressed again, but to depressed to do anything about it
Finished my first paint by number!!! Love how it turned out!

Listening to my favorite music as I wait for darkness to see and photograph Saturn. As someone who struggled to make rent for years I’m so thankful and grateful for my life and this feeling of happiness.
